post.title: That’s A Lot of Space
post.content: John was just in here admiring my Nomad Zen Xtra. I’ve got nearly 500 albums loaded, over 6000 songs, and I’ve only filled it half way. On my recent trip to Atlanta, I realized I regularly travel with 220 GB of storage. 60GB internal laptop drive, 60GB multibay drive, 60GB Iomega external portable USB drive and the 40GB Nomad Zen. I can even get really obscene and make it a round 300GB, with my new Argosy drive enclosure (thanks to Peter for recommending Argosy) and extra 80GB drive.
